Text: Awesome guy Thank you.  Will continue to see after download is finished.  Thanks for your effort
thanks. now you have to seed another 100% for my 2 thanks.

Thanks for the upload.  This is better than the alternative, since there are no other public Kira Kener packs I know of, it could be much better.  There's probably only about 3gb of actual Kira Kener content here since most of this pack seems to be full movies, not just the scenes with Kira in them.  I'm making my way through the movies now and separating them into scenes.  When I'm finished I may upload a new version of this pack.

Also, avoid "Any Dorm in a Storm" unless you don't mind audio completely out of sync with video (audio is 2 minutes late).  I tried fixing it but I'm not knowledgeable enough for the task.  When I export the audio as WAV or MP3 from VirtualDub it's all screwed up so I can't try the next step of remuxing.

If I find any more messed up files I'll post another comment.
